get.description: Allow to search a place from a text

parameters.name: minRating
parameters.description: Minimum rating for on the place

get.description: Provide the comments on a given place with pagination

post.summary: Post a command on a place
post.description: Post a comment on a given place
Set a user notice status like or remove like on a place

likeState.description: Like state. true to like or remove the previous like , false to dislike

post.description: Initialize user registration by validating data's and sending confirmation mail

confirmationCode.description: The encrypted confirmation code to send back on confirmation if success

iv.description: Encryption iv to send back, in pair with the confirmation code if success

encryptedConfirmationCode.description: Encrypted code received on the initialization step

redirectUrl.description: The url to redirect on depends on the type of application. Have to be one of the registered urls

link.description: Redirection link to authenticate with google

post.description: Initialize forgot password process, validate data's and send confirmation mail

encryptionIv.description: Encryption iv on success in pair with confirmationCode

post.description: Confirm forgot password verification and update the password

encryptionIv.description: Encryption iv on success in pair with confirmationCode

userConfirmationCode.description: The input confirmation code by user

items.description: User data elements type from enumerationn value as int

200.description: User fetched data's. The object will be indexed by the enumeration integer value and will contain as values the requested elements. Only the asked ones will be provided

schema.description: The object will be indexed by the enumeration integer value and will contain as values the requested elements. Only the asked ones will be provided

post.description: Modify the user profile image or set it if there were no image

imageUrl.description: The profile picture url on success

post.description: Edit the user profile from the provided fields. The birthdate can only be update the first time.

post.summary: Add a place in the user wish list
post.description: Add a place in the user wish list

delete.summary: Delete a place in the user wish list
delete.description: Delete a place in the user wish list

frequency.description: Count of times the same search were made

post.summary: Provide recommandations for an authenticated user
post.description: Provide recommandations for an authenticated user

callbackDatas.description: Callback data's to provide on every requests

errorMessage.description: Error message or null on error

isOpenedNow.description: Boolean indicated if the place is openened at the moment of the request

categories.description: Elements categories from the registered categories on the applications

callbackDatas.description: Object to return if the place need to be recognized in another request

comments.description: Comments on the place, mix between application comments and google maps comments

callbackDatas.description: Data to provide to if the travel route need to be recognized in another request
